dict.acceptation: 更坏的；恶化的；更厉害的；严重的( bad,ill,badly的比较级)；
更坏地，更糟地；（程度上）更…；

sent.orig: My flu seems to be getting worse and worse.
sent.trans: 我的感冒好像越来越重了。

sent.orig: The worse the photopolymer shranks, the worse is the hologram reconstructed.
sent.trans: 理论分析表明，材料收缩越严重，全息图再现质量越差。

sent.orig: But evil men and impostors will grow worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.
sent.trans: 13只是作恶的和迷惑人的，必越久越恶，他欺哄人，也被人欺哄。

sent.orig: That day his hunger grew worse, worse than the hurt in his foot.
sent.trans: 那一天，他饥饿难忍，甚至比他脚上的伤更严重。

sent.orig: Yeah. the environment is worse and worse now.
sent.trans: 是啊，现在环境是越来越糟糕了。
